title: Mods are sexist.
body:
So that "I'm a girl, AMA" thread and "I have tits, AMA" thread are both still up, but my "I have a penis, AMA" thread was taken down.

I would have been fine if those other two were taken down as well, but ONLY mine was? Yeah, thanks, sexist mods.

Riot, your modding staff is complete garbage. Fire them and hire people with brains.
